row.Description1: Maroon and olive green printed woven maxi dress, has a shirt collar, short sleeves, button closure and flared hem
row.Description2: Dress length: 56 inches. Hand spun and hand-woven

row.Description1: Maroon solid woven wrap dress with ruffled detail, has shoulder straps, short sleeves, concealed zip closure, an attached lining, and flared hem

The top, made in grainy cotton dobby features a high neck , smocking details at the neck, cuffs and front and back for a better fit and wooden buttons at the back.The hand embroidered cuffs gives it more elevated appeal.
row.Description2: Hand wash or dry clean only

row.Description1: A go-to dress made in soft cotton poplin featuring wide pleats on the waist and side pockets for comfort functioning. Made in fine cotton poplin this mid calf length dress is embellished with stitched pleats in the front and the back to intentionally fit at the waist and flare downwards! Features discreet pockets on the side seams and concealed zip on the side!

Our new Elementary tote bag hand-stitched to perfection promises to be the organiser your daily accessories / gadgets need. Features an antique finish lock and a single shoulder strap for easy carrying.

An easy everyday shirt dress with a notched collar , a full button down front and an unstructured waistline. An oversized dress for a size small ,slightly less oversized for size medium and fitted for a large size.
row.Description2: Hand wash or dry clean only

row.Description1: A perfect mix of design and functionality, this Vintage inspired calf length dress, made in cotton linen blend, features a drawstring waist, hand embroidered buttons in the front and a peter pan collar.
row.Description2: Materials-Linon,Hand wash or dry clean only

row.Description1: Flowly and breathable made in cotton linen for an ideal summer day, hand embroidered buttons in the front and a peter pan collar. hand embroidered buttons in the front and a peter pan collar..
This dress looks beautiful in every ocassion.Features a drawstring that clinches the waist. Made in soft rayon twill this dress falls beautifully.
A perfect dress for a day or an evening out . Features a drawstring that clinches the waist. Made in soft rayon twill this dress falls beautifully.

Made from a velvety-soft cotton with a light, crisp quality, this top features unique gather details on the shoulders and contrast piping details. It has subtle fabric tie fastenings placed at the cuffs. Looks best when paired with our Skants pants(as seen here)
